# activeStatusDidChangeNotification

**Type Property**

A notification that posts when the value of the Music Haptics system setting changes.

## Declaration

```swift
class let activeStatusDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Checking if Music Haptics is on

- **isActive**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system setting for Music Haptics is on.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system setting for Music Haptics is on.
